 BlindFear:
Blindfear didn't say anything and left the darkavian, in order to locate and open comm link with Abominus
  robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote: Megatron rang inside of Blindfear's ears through his communication link.
"You do not need to swim, just sink and tell him to surface. If you are
to afraid of the water, think of some other way to attract his
attention." Megatron hissed impatiently.
